issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Implement ArrowReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4219](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4219). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ArrowReader reads parquet into arrow. In this ticket our goal is to  implement get_schema and read row groups into record batch iterator.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4219?focusedCommentId=16951423) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5523
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5523>
